content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello, Bo Li. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I am looking to maximize my gains, so I am open to negotiating the rental price with you. What price are you willing to pay for this 25-square-meter space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month for this apartment. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Bo Li from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Bo Li, but I am looking to receive a higher rental price for this apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but I am not accepting your current offer of 1000 Euros per month. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month, but I am open to negotiate further. Can we agree on a rental price of 800 Euros per month?

TERMINATE
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your response, Bo Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am looking to maximize my gains and I am not willing to accept a rental price of 800 Euros per month. I am sorry to terminate this negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine
